title: Updated Chic Townhome! Attached Garage! Walkable To Dining/Shopping
posting_body: Nestled at the intersection of Highway 75 and the Woodall Rodgers Freeway.,  Newly renovated community of mid-rise apartments and townhomes.
Near these apartments in Dallas, you will find Fortune 500 companies, top rated dining, and a myriad of shopping, all within a fifteen minute radius.
Within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.

Sandwiched between the high-end shops of Uptown and the towering buildings of downtown Dallas, these contemporary apartments give you the best of city living with the convenience of a spacious suburban home.
Studio, one, two and three bedroom homes, each crafted with the finest materials and attention to detail.
Kitchens have stainless steel GE appliances, under mount lighting, granite countertops and breakfast bars.
Outside the apartments, residents can enjoy a variety of amenities.
Whether you want to break a sweat in the multi-level fitness center or take your dog out to the paw park.
Pleases call Desiree with DASH Realty
